title: Ellen Comments On The Travel Ban Using 'Finding Dory' (WATCH) | Alex | KISS 95.7
text:
Ellen Comments On The Travel Ban Using 'Finding Dory' (WATCH) posted by Alex Gervasi - share 
Ellen Degeneres wants you to know that she doesn't usually get political, but she decided to use her movie Finding Dory to speak to a bigger issue. 
This was a perfect time to do so since Donald Trump screened the movie while thousands of people protested his travel ban over the weekend. 
Leave it to Ellen to protest in her own unique way. {"position1":{"name":"Ellen DeGeneres","id":492068,"url":"https:\/\/www.iheart.com\/artist\/ellen-degeneres-492068","type":"artist","errors":null,"tagged":true}} Tweets by @AlexontheMic What's up? I'm Alex! So I guess I'll tell you a little bit about myself. I grew up in South Jersey (10 minutes from Philly) and went to school a few minutes from Lexington, Kentucky. Growing up I always wanted to be on the air. What's better than talking about and listening to music for a living? Sounds like a pretty good job to me. I'm here to to provide some good music for your ears and keep you informed on all the latest things happening around here. Sound good? Follow me on Twitter/Instagram: @alexonthemic Contact
